list.name: Default
list.comment: Added logging of fitness of each individual for each generation.

task.summary: Default task
Cleaning up
Cleaning up
Updating README
Removing duplicated README
Adding README
Initial version of a game
Removing redundant code
Removing redundant code
Adding additional receivers and emitters to allow sending/evolution of games.
Actors now take part in trials that consist of 10 games each. No evolution of games added yet.
Added evolution of games - initial version.
Forgot to clear the receiver :D
Epucks position is now reset after each game.
Updating world file to add new emitter/receiver nodes.
Added variance of actor fitness as a fitness of games. Fixed small bugs.
Cleaning up utilities
Adding comments to StringUtil class
Added logging to files.
Commit before modifying the way actors are assessed on the games [Better safe than sorry]
Actors are now assessed on all games after completing a trial. No game evolution.
Added logging of fitness of each individual for each generation.
Logging fix: Added commas after each individual's fitness
Added variance calculation
Cleaning up
Improved logging
Fix: Resetting overall fitness of the games after new generation of actors has been created.
Added more comments
Fixing minor bugs and adding additional logging. Using roulette selection instead of rank selection.
Removing rank selection.
Changing data structure for fitness scores. Fixing minor bugs.
Changing value of black line colour that's used by fitness function.
Changing game constructor to allow varied number of constants
Changing fitness function polynomial
Added normalisation of fitness score. Fixed a problem with min_fitness used for roulette selection - caused infinite loop when all scores were negative.
Added method to calculate standard deviation.
Bug fix: last individual in population was not evaluated. Changing normalisation to (0,1).
Updated normalisation of fitness scores.
Implementing roulette selection for evolution's crossover
Improved version of fitness function polynomial
Bug fix: population size now refers to games and not to nn.
Bug fix: Additional break from loop added as certain conditions cause infinite loop.
Roulette selection won't work with 3 individuals and elitism! Replacing it with rank selection.
Added methods to calcualate max_in and min_int for fitness score normalization (avoiding external libs).
Added methods to find max and min for normalization of fitness scores
Using current max and min for normalization.
Using current max and min for normalization.
Added logging of all actor fitnesses - to plot fitness of each actor in each generation
Added logging of fitness of each individual for each generation.
Renamed method to log component fitness
Adding some comments to logging file
Cleaning up
Added storing of last games generation
Added light sensor
Added logging of games genomes and increased population of games to 20. Initialised randomly.
Improving normalisation
Bug fix: Fitness of actors is normalised separately for each game - since each game produces different max and min. Ensures fair normalization.
Cleaning up
Bug fix: Fitness arrays are now reset after each actor evaluation
Fitness of actors is normalized by epuck controller now. Changing how messaging is performed.
Changing how fitness is normalised, changign messaging, adding fitness function to move towards the light.
Added saving of best actor to a file
Bug fix: states array was not being updated so no additional sensorimotor inputs were passed to neural network
Testing fine tuned line following.
Added Display on which current e-puck position is drawn. The image is stored to the file.
